purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of entities defined elsewhere that may act as a resource. A resource is something that is needed in order to achieve a specified objective.

ul.li: A single item or a group of items defined to act as a resource;

purpose.p: The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:

inscope.li: Grouping of resources defined to act as a resource in its own right.

description.p: The Resource_item UoF enables the definition of resources. A resource can be either a single item or a group of items.
